name: lustrously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very shiny: Her hair is lustrously blonde.
the quality of being special in an attractive way that people admire: She sang lustrously with emotional depth. The mountains were lustrously photographed. See
lustrous
More examplesFewer examplesHer red cheeks contrast lustrously with her black hair.He dresses in crisp silk suits and lustrously polished shoes.The costumes were lustrously glamorous.I was given a luxurious, lustrously soft cashmere scarf. He has written a lustrously poetic novel.
